synopsis: It is a peaceful day at the palace. Urutori found an abandoned baby. Benawi told Kurou to investigate nearby villages to identify the baby's parents. Meanwhile, Urutori takes care of the baby.

Eruruu was kidnapped by an Onkami named Nopon and a Kimamau named Gomuta. They asked Eruruu to make a medicine that will make someone look young to help their mistress, Kamuchataaru, a bar owner who is in love with a man who likes young women.

Hakuoro and Touka went to fish and they also brought Aruruu and Mukkuru along with them. While fishing, Hakuoro told Touka, stories about the spirit of the river, who swims in the river in the form of a fish. After a while, Benawi found where they are fishing. Benawi dragged Hakuoro back to the palace to continue his royal duties. Before he goes, Hakuoro told Touka to catch the spirit of the river. With that said, Touka waited for the spirit of the river to take her bait.
